song_lyric:
Lying beside you
Here in the dark
Feelin' your heartbeat
With mine

Softly you whisper
You're so sincere
How could our love be so blind?

We sailed on together
We drifted apart
And here you are by my side

So now, I come to you
With open arms
Nothing to hide
Believe what I say

So here I am
With open arms
Hopin' youll see
What your love means to me

Open arms

Living without you
Living alone
This empty house seems so cold

Wanting to hold you
Wanting you near
How much I wanted you home

But now that youve come back
Turned night into day
I need you to stay

So now, I come to you
With open arms
Nothing to hide
Believe what I say

So here I am with open arms
Hopin' youll see
What your love means to me

Open arms

Hopin' you’ll see
What your love means to me
Open arms
